definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: As a result, historically SLAs have specialized in savings deposits and mortgage lending.
sentences.chinese: 因此，存貸款社長期專精於儲蓄賬戶和抵押借貸。

sentences.english: Key lending and deposit rates have also been raised.
sentences.chinese: 同時還調高了存貸款利率。
